errors.error_description: Specifies Python 2.7 as minimum requirement when Python 2 is deprecated and modern packages require Python 3
correction_candidates: flavio requires Python 3.6 or higher to function properly
flavio requires Python 3.8+ for optimal performance and compatibility
flavio supports Python 3.7 and later versions
flavio is compatible with Python 3.9 and above
errors.golden_answer: flavio requires Python 3.6 or higher to function properly
